Our client is a leading provider of innovative selfie booth solutions, dedicated to enhancing events and experiences. They are seeking a Content Manager to take the lead on creating marketing and brand strategies and manage the content creation and brand messaging/positioning.This role is ideal for someone with 3-5 years of marketing experience, who is a native English speaker and possesses strong social media management, content creation, and analytical skills.Location: Fully-Remote (Work from Home), 9 AM - 5 PM PSTKey Responsibilities:Marketing Strategy: Take the lead on creating comprehensive marketing and brand strategies to drive business growth and enhance brand awareness. Social Media Management: Manage social media platforms including Instagram, TikTok, and others. Plan and schedule engaging content, interact with followers and monitor performance metrics. Content Creation: Develop marketing content for various channels, including social media posts, marketing copy, messaging, and email campaigns. Design experience with Canva is advantageous but not required. Campaign Implementation: Implement marketing campaigns across multiple channels and measure their effectiveness using relevant metrics and KPIs. Online Presence: Develop and execute strategies to establish a solid online presence and ensure effective brand positioning in the market. Email Marketing: Utilize email marketing tools to create and send engaging email campaigns and newsletters. Segment audiences and analyze campaign performance. Copywriting: Write compelling copy for landing pages, advertisements, and promotional materials to drive conversions and engagement. What Success Looks Like:Effective Marketing Strategies: Your strategic marketing initiatives lead to increased brand awareness, customer engagement, and business growth. Engaging Social Media Presence: Your management of social media platforms results in a vibrant and engaged community of followers. Content Creation Excellence: Your marketing content effectively communicates the brand's message and resonates with the target audience. Campaign Performance: Your campaigns generate positive ROI and contribute to achieving business objectives. Online Presence and Brand Positioning: Your efforts establish a strong online presence and position the brand effectively in the market. Required Skills and Qualifications:Marketing Experience: 3-5 years of experience in marketing or a related field. Social Media Management: Proven experience managing social media platforms and creating engaging content. Content Creation: Strong writing skills with the ability to create compelling marketing copy and messaging. Analytical Skills: Ability to measure and analyze marketing campaign performance using relevant metrics and KPIs. Email Marketing: Experience with email marketing tools and strategies. Copywriting: Excellent copywriting skills with the ability to craft persuasive and impactful messaging. Brand Management: Experience in brand management is a plus. This role offers a unique opportunity for a Content Manager to take the lead on creating marketing and brand strategies for a leading provider of selfie booth solutions. If you are an experienced marketer with strong social media management, content creation, and analytical skills, we invite you to apply and join our team in enhancing events and experiences through innovative solutions.Application Process:To be considered for this role these steps need to be followed:Fill in the application formRecord a video showcasing your skill sets

économistes de SCET-TUNISIE intervient sont variés et touchent à l’économie du développement, l’économie des transports, etc. Les pays d’intervention sont la Tunisie et de nombreux pays d’Afrique subsaharienne.Les types de prestations assurées concernent les études de faisabilité et d’opportunité, les études économiques de projets d’infrastructures de transport, les problématiques de la infrastructures, de transport et de la mobilité urbaine.Il/Elle participe aux études générales et d’aménagement du territoire concernant le volet socio-économique des projets en concertation avec les autres membres de l’équipe d’étude.Les dossiers de candidature (CV détaillé, lettre de motivation) sont à envoyer à l’adresse suivante : recrutement@scet-tunisie.com.tnSeuls les candidats dont le sources disponiblesFaire le suivi et le traitement des enquêtes de terrain (enquêtes de transport, enquêtes socio-économiques.Elaborer les rapports de faisabilité liés aux thématiques de transport, de l’infrastructure et la mobilité urbaine.Elaborer les rapports techniques des projets de développement de Master Plan de transport et/ou de mobilité.Participer aux études d’aménagement du territoire et d’urbanismeCompétencesMaitriser le cadre socio-économique des zones d’influence lies aux projetsÊtre capable d’élaborer les rapports demandés en faisant preuve d’une qualité rédactionnelle avérée.Une We support peace and prosperity by building connections, understanding and trust between people in the UK and countries worldwide.We work directly with individuals to help them gain the skills, confidence and connections to transform their lives and shape a better world in partnership with the UK. We support them to build networks and explore creative ideas, to learn English, to get a high-quality education and to gain internationally recognised qualifications.Working with people in over 200 countries and territories, we are on the ground in more than 100 countries. In 2021–22 we reached 650 million people.Job Location: TunisiaJoin British Council Talent Community If you are interested in working with us, the talent community is the best place for you to showcase your passion and motivation.What are the benefits of creating a profile? You will not wait for an opening to apply.You will not miss one of the interesting opportunities here.Your chance of landing a job is increased, as you could be matched for numerous positions.You only need to join once.Join our talent community today and tell us what is your passion about? Why join us? The British Council’s work makes a difference to people’s lives. We are proud of the work we do, and the opportunities we create worldwide. You can expect your colleagues to be committed, passionate and dedicated to our common goal. The British Council believes strongly in the principles of equality, diversity and inclusion and you will find your colleagues welcoming, friendly and accepting of difference.Colleagues will always be respectful of you and your opinions. Employees are expected to be friendly and professional, open, and approachable. We foster a learning environment, where ideas are exchanged.We welcome discussion and debate, ideas, and challenge, we bring expert knowledge, intelligence, and commitment to create opportunities to progress and develop connections around the world.By Joining the British Council, you will be encouraged to think about your own career development and to take advantage of learning and training opportunities.Roles Titles: Senior Teacher, Senior Teacher YLs, and Senior Teacher Adults Roles PurposesTo maintain and enhance professional development and academic quality in the teaching centre, through the management of in-house teacher development programmes and support.To promote and ensure quality teaching and effective learning of English.To provide learners with a rewarding and stimulating English language learning experience.To support the wider aims of British Council and its cultural relations missionThe Ideal Candidate Should Have2 years post-diploma i.e. DELTA/Trinity Diploma TESOL (Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages) experience.Extensive knowledge and experience of management and delivery of teacher training.Experience of line managing/ coordinating teaching teams.Experience in teaching relevant age groups “According to the role”Early Years, Primary, Lower and Upper Secondary agedUniversity/Vocational students and Adults General EnglishUndergraduate Degree.Cambridge CELTA/Trinity Certificate TESOL.Cambridge DELTA/Trinity Diploma TESOL or equivalent as recognised by the British Council.YL teaching certificate i.e. CELTYL or TYLEC “For Senior Teacher and Senior Teacher YLs”What We Can Offer YouRelocation support for expatsProfessional and learning developmentBasic SalaryMedical InsuranceAllowancesDynamic, flexible, and healthy environmentOpportunities for future movements within BC’s network globallyA connected and trusted UK in a more connected and trusted world.Equality , Diversity, and Inclusion (EDI) StatementThe British Council is committed to policies and practices of equality, diversity and inclusion across everything we do. We support all staff to make sure their behaviour is consistent with this commitment. We want to address under representation and encourage applicants from under-represented groups, in particular, but not exclusively, on grounds of ethnicity and disability. All disabled applicants who meet the essential criteria are guaranteed an interview and we have Disability Confident Employer Status. We welcome discussions about specific requirements or adjustments to enable participation and engagement in our work and activities.The British Council is committed to safeguarding children, young people and adults who we work with.We believe that all children and adults everywhere in the world deserve to live in safe environments and have the right to be protected from all forms of abuse, maltreatment and exploitation as set out in article 19, UNCRC (United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child) 1989.Appointment to positions where there is direct involvement with vulnerable groups will be dependent on thorough checks being completed; these will include qualification checks, reference checks, identity & criminal record checks in line with legal requirements and with the British Council’s Safeguarding policies for Adults and Children.If you have any problems with your application please email  askhr@britishcouncil.orgPlease note: Applications to this role can only be considered when made through the Apply section of our careers website. Our ‘ASK HR’ email is only to be used in case of a technical issue encountered when applying through the careers website. Emails with supporting statements and CV/Resumes sent to this email address will not be reviewed and will be deleted.

Company Description Home in Tunisia is the largest real estate network in Tunisia, providing real estate services and investment opportunities for both Tunisians and foreigners. With over 10 years of experience, Home in Tunisia has successfully completed numerous real estate projects and is dedicated to promoting Tunisian real estate to international investors. Our team of agents and brokers share a commitment to client satisfaction, enjoy challenges, and have a genuine passion for the real estate industry. Role Description This is a full-time leadership team role at Home in Tunisia, located in the Sousse Metropolitan Area with the flexibility to work remotely. As a member of the leadership team, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing various aspects of our real estate operations. Your day-to-day tasks may include strategic planning, team management, project coordination, business development, customer relationship management, and financial analysis. This is a hybrid role, which means you will primarily work from our Sousse office but will also have the option to work remotely as needed. Qualifications Strong leadership and management skillsExperience in the real estate industryExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsAbility to multitask and prioritize tasks effectivelyProblem-solving and decision-making abilitiesStrong business acumenProficiency in project managementExperience in financial analysis and planningKnowledge of property market trendsBachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., business, real estate, finance)Fluency in English and Arabic (French is a plus)

About Jumia:Jumia believes that technology has the potential to transform everyday life in Africa for the better. Jumia was built to help consumers access millions of goods and services conveniently and at the best prices while opening up a new way for sellers to reach consumers and grow their businesses.Listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in 2019, Jumia is the leading e-commerce company in Africa, operating in 11 countries. The Jumia platform consists of a marketplace, which connects sellers with consumers, a logistics service, which enables the shipment and delivery of packages from sellers to consumers, and a payment service, JumiaPay, which offers a safe and easy solution to facilitate online payment transactions. The company offers goods across a broad range of categories, such as phones and electronics, home appliances, fast-moving consumer goods, fashion and beauty.What you will be doing:Handle relationships with new and current suppliers (including talking to them everyday and developing a rapport).Getting the weekly promotion items from the suppliers.Organizing key commercial events such as Black Friday, Jumia Anniversary, and Mobile Week. Negotiating costs and payment terms with the suppliers.Achieving the targets of revenue, items sold, gross margin, assortment, vendor base Getting new releases as soon as the suppliers have them.Shortlisting and prioritizing key suppliers.Handling pricing and assortment strategy Finding new suppliers, try to source and sell every product within your category.Monitor stock levels and plan the purchasing policy well in advance.Having an accurate knowledge of competition: who they are, what prices they have and their products.Analyze consumer buying behaviour and predict future trends.Producing Monthly sales reports.Building an amicable user interface for our vendors and our customersWhat we are looking for:4 years experience at least in the sales fieldExcellent command of Excel, results-orientedExcellent interpersonal skills, knowledge of the market Initiative, dynamism, rigour and tenacityFluency in French and EnglishWe Offer:A unique experience in an entrepreneurial, yet structured environmentA unique opportunity of having strong impact in building the African e-commerce sectorThe opportunity to become part of a highly professional and dynamic teamAn unparalleled personal and professional growth as our longer term objective is to train the next generation of leadersPlease ensure to only apply for jobs with Jumia through our official website.Jumia will never charge you a fee to apply for a job: be wary of websites that claim to help you apply for a Jumia job or that charge a fee to get you a job.

Description de l'entrepriseEdifis Group est une entreprise leaderd'importation et de distribution d'équipements sanitaires. Nous sommes les représentants exclusifs de grandes entreprises européennes, dont notamment la marque suisse Geberit et lesmarques allemandes Hansgrohe et Axor enTunisie.Vous souhaitez donner à votre carrière de nouvelles perspectives, poursuivre des challenges permanents et intégrer une entreprise en plein développement ? Ce poste est fait pour vous.Ce que nous offrons :un environnement de travail caractérisé par des normes élevées et un enthousiasme pour ce que nous faisons. Nos employés bénéficient d'un environnement de travail positif avec beaucoup de créativité et de flexibilité. Nous promouvons leur performance avec des programmes de formation professionnelleet diverses perspectives de carrière., Description du posteRattaché(e) au Responsable du showroom, vous accueillez et conseillez une clientèle de particuliers et de professionnels en conception d’espaces sanitaire et salle de bains.Dans ce cadre, vous aurez pour principales missions de :Assurer l’accueil physique et téléphonique des clients ;Présenter nos gammes de produits ;Analyser les attentes des clients et leur proposer une solution adaptée ;Établir des offres de prix ;Assurer le suivi de la clientèle ;Veiller au respect des procédures en matière de dossier de vente à établir ;Tenir unreporting quotidien précis de votre activité ;Participer à l’optimisation du fonctionnement du showroom ;Participer ponctuellement aux événements professionnels sur lesquels nous sommes présents sur le territoire national. , QualificationsDe formation Bac / Bac+2 en commerce, vous justifiez de 3 ans d’expérience minimum sur un poste similaire, de préférence en salle d’exposition sanitaire / salle de bains ;Vous avez une sensibilité pour l’univers de l'équipement de la maison, et les tendances du marché de la décoration ;Enfin, vous êtes à l’aise avec l’outil informatique que vous utiliserez au quotidien (Pack Office, CRM, Sage, etc.). Informations supplémentairesVos qualités d’écoute et de conseil, votre aisance relationnelle, votre dynamisme, votre esprit d’équipe, votre ponctualité ainsi que votre tempérament commercial seront des atouts indispensables à la réussite de votre mission.

Description de l'entreprisePourquoi travailler chez Accor ?Nous sommes bien plus qu’un leader mondial. Nous vous accueillons comme vous êtes et vous pouvez trouver le métier et la marque qui correspond à votre personnalité.Nous vous accompagnons dans votre évolution et votre apprentissage au quotidien, nous nous assurons que votre travail apporte du sens à votre vie. Ainsi, durant votre expérience avec nous, vous pouvez explorer les possibilités illimitée du Groupe Accor.En rejoignant Accor, vous écrivez chaque chapitre de votre histoire et ensemble nous pouvons imaginer l’Hôtellerie de demain. Découvrez la vie qui vous attend chez Accor, https://careers.accor.com/.Faites ce que vous aimez, prenez soin du monde qui vous entoure, oser challenger le status quo ! #BELIMITLESS, Description du posteAgent de réservations (H/F)Vous êtes au commencement d'une expérience client exceptionnelle. En tant qu'Agent de réservations (H/F), vous représentez cette expérience dès l'accueil du client!Ce que l'établissement vous offre :En quelques mots, mettez en valeur les bénéfices et les avantages à travailler dans votre établissementCarte collaborateurs offrant des taux réduits chez AccorPlan de formations délivrées dans nos AcadémiesL’opportunité de développer vos talents et de vous épanouir au sein de votre établissement et à travers le mondeLa capacité à faire la différence à travers nos activités Ethiques & Responsabilité Sociale des Entreprises, comme Planet 21Votre rôle :Proposer une offre de services exceptionnels et attrayants aux clientsGarantir la meilleure sélection pour le client et les meilleurs profits à travers l'offre de servicesRecommander les équipements et services de l'établissement, et assister les clients et leurs requêtesEffectuer les réservations, saisir la rooming list et la mise à jour des fichiers clients, QualificationsVotre expérience et vos compétences incluent :Qualité de service client essentielleInformations supplémentairesune expérience similaire est un plusMaîtrise du logiciel Opera ou équivalentBonne communication et capacité à gérer les conflitsMaîtrise de l'Anglais, la pratique d'autres langues est un plus.Votre équipe et votre environnement de travail :En quelques mots, présentez l’équipe, l’établissement ou l’environnement de travail qui reflète la culture de l'équipeNote : Vous pouvez inclure ici les spécificités locales ou les critères légaux, tels que le permis de travail.Notre Engagement Diversité & Inclusion :Nous sommes une entreprise inclusive et notre ambition est d’attirer, de recruter, et de promouvoir la diversité des talents.

Our client is a dynamic SEO and digital marketing agency focused on delivering exceptional marketing solutions that drive results. As they continue to grow, they are seeking a Senior Graphic Designer who can contribute to various projects with minimal supervision. This role is perfect for a creative self-starter who excels in producing high-quality visual content across multiple platforms.Location: Fully-Remote (Work from Home), 9 AM - 5 PM ESTKey Responsibilities:Landing Page Design: Create visually appealing and effective landing pages that enhance user experience and drive conversions. Ad Creative Development: Produce high-quality ad creatives for various digital marketing campaigns that align with strategic marketing goals. Social Media Graphics: Design compelling graphics for social media platforms that resonate with the target audience and boost engagement. Brand Guidelines Management: Assist in developing and refining brand guidelines to ensure consistency across all marketing materials. What Success Looks Like:Innovative Design Solutions: You consistently deliver fresh and impactful visual content that enhances brand visibility and engagement. High Efficiency and Autonomy: Your ability to work independently reduces the need for direct supervision and increases project throughput. Strong Brand Coherence: Through your attention to detail and adherence to brand guidelines, you maintain a cohesive visual identity that resonates with the target audience. Required Skills and Qualifications:Proven Design Expertise: Extensive experience in graphic design within a marketing or advertising agency. Strong Creative Vision: Ability to generate unique ideas for new marketing campaigns and the skill to execute them flawlessly. Having agency experience is super helpful. Technical Proficiency: Expertise in major design software, particularly Figma and Adobe Creative Suite. Attention to Detail: Exceptional attention to detail with a commitment to creating high-quality design work that adheres to brand standards and user experience best practices. Time Management: Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines. Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal and communication skills, capable of expressing ideas clearly and collaborating effectively with remote teams. This role offers a fantastic opportunity for a Senior Graphic Designer to play a key role in a growing digital marketing agency. If you are passionate about design and are looking for a role where you can exhibit your creativity and independence, we invite you to apply.Application Process:To be considered for this role these steps need to be followed:Fill in the application formRecord a video showcasing your skill sets

AudaCity Capital is a progressive and flourishing prop trading firm, and trading education provider.We are based in London, and at the moment have a team of highly trained properly trading professionals, managing the company’s extensive funds on our City of London based trading floor.We believe that the only way to be a winner in our industry is to invest heavily in talented people who want to grow with us.We are seeking like-minded professionals to develop their skills and enable them to join our team.We trade on all major asset classes on multiple exchanges with our own capital and do not handle any client funds or have customers. By becoming a member of the team, you become part of our success.We are market leaders because we have always had an internal vision to promote a strong entrepreneurial working culture.Our mission statement is to mix a strong base of intellectual capital with state-of-the-art technology, to build for the future.Our trading has a unique combination of skills, talent, and industry-leading software, which has been produced in-house by the company development department.Strict, Prudent Risk ManagementYou can have guts, but not glory, if you don’t back your trading moves with proper management practices. That’s why we treat risk management with the utmost seriousness …The RolePricing and executing trades for ENTER_PRODUCT in line with internal guidelines with the objective of maximising returns.Providing internal stakeholders with daily market/pricing information.Working closely with the front office, clients and internal stakeholders to ensure accurate trade capture, manage risks and deliver excellent client servicing.Booking of trades and ensuring accuracy of positions.Ensuring all trades are booked correctly and liaising with the front office or clients to address any discrepancies in a timely manner.Reconciling present value of trades between the front office and middle office at the end of each day and accounting for all daily outstanding and unprocessed trades.Ensuring compliance with and enhancing control processes around trade booking, verification and reconciliation.Ensuring compliance with regulatory guidelines.Ideal ProfileYou have at least 1 year experience including solid experience in a similar role within Financial Services. You possess strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical dataYou pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standardYou are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environmentsWhat's on Offer?Work in a company with a solid track record of performanceJoin a well known brand within Asset ManagementLeadership Role

Company Description Agrikol Group is an experienced and multi-faceted greenhouse construction company based in Tunis. We provide a wide range of services to fully accommodate our customers' greenhouse requests, including greenhouse/glasshouse building, supervision services, turnkey projects, maintenance and repair, internal equipment installation, project preparation, steel structure assembly and installation, demolition, conceptual design, and vertical farming system. For more information, please contact us at office@agrikol.rs or visit our website www.agrikol.rs. Role Description This is a full-time on-site role for a Construction Worker at Agrikol Group. The Construction Worker will be responsible for performing various day-to-day tasks related to greenhouse construction, including masonry work, research, construction, flooring, and renovation. The role requires working on-site in Tunis. QualificationsExperience in research and analysis related to construction projectsGeneral construction knowledge and skillsExperience in flooring installation and repairRenovation experience, including demolition and remodelingGood physical stamina and ability to work in various weather conditionsEffective communication and teamwork skillsExperience in greenhouse construction is a plusRelevant certifications or qualifications in construction

Depuis plus de 75 ans, BIC crée des produits ingénieusement simples et ludiques, ancrés dans le cœur et le quotidien de chacun.En rejoignant notre équipe, vous participerez à la valorisation constante d'une marque mondialement reconnue, en continuant d’imaginer des produits essentiels du quotidien de manière innovante, durable et responsable.Chez BIC, notre approche du travail peut se résumer par l’expression « retrousser ses manches et agir », créant un environnement où s'épanouissent l'initiative personnelle, la résolution de problèmes et l'esprit d'innovation. Les membres de l'équipe BIC ont la possibilité de prendre en charge leur carrière et d'apporter leur point de vue unique afin d’avoir un impact concret sur notre mission.C'est un monde coloré - laissez votre empreinte en rejoignant l'équipe BIC dès aujourd'hui.Description De PosteLe superviseur de nuit est appelé à gérer l’usine en poste nuit ce qui inclut le respect des objectifs de production, la gestion du personnel des ateliers et la veille sur le respect des consignes de sécurité.Les Principales missions:Garantir l’ensemble de la production des différents ateliers et s’assurer que l’approvisionnement de matière et / ou de pièces aux postes de travail est à disposition.Assurer le suivi de plannings de production des ateliersVeiller au respect des délais de productionAssurer l'application des procédures de fabricationProposer des actions correctives pour limiter les anomaliesGérer la non-qualitéGarantir le bon état constant de fonctionnement des outils et moyens de productionAppliquer et faire appliquer les consignes de sécuritéContrôler les niveaux de sécurité sur les machinesAssurer le rangement, la propreté et la clarté des flux dans les divers ateliers avec les différents responsablesS’assurer de la répartition des tâches entre les collaborateurs, en fonction du planning de productionS’assurer de la bonne gestion et organisation du temps de travail des salariés de l’atelierAssurer la discipline et un climat de travail satisfaisantReporter au responsable hiérarchique l’activité de l’équipe de nuit ainsi que toutes les explications des problèmes qui peuvent être rencontrées lors de l’équipeQualifications:Diplôme : Technicien Supérieure/ Maîtrise/ Ingénieur ou équivalentSpécialité : Technique/ Scientifique5 ans dans une fonction similaire en milieu industriel multinationalLangues : Français courant (lu, parlé et écrit)Informatique : Avoir des connaissances de base en informatiqueRigueur et autonomieAptitudes à la communication orale et écriteEsprit d’analyse et de synthèseAptitude au Management des situations difficiles au travail Orientation vers le travail en équipe et collaboration verticale et transversale.BIC est un employeur qui respecte l'égalité des chances. Nous nous engageons fermement à embaucher des personnes ayant des parcours et des expériences différentes pour nous aider à construire de meilleurs produits, prendre de meilleures décisions et à mieux servir nos clients. Nous ne pratiquons aucune discrimination fondée sur la religion, la couleur de peau, la nationalité, le sexe, l'orientation sexuelle, le statut d'ancien combattant, le statut de travailleur handicapé ou toute autre caractéristique similaire. Tout emploi est décidé en fonction des qualifications, du mérite et des besoins de l'entreprise.BIC n'accepte pas de curriculum vitae non sollicités de la part de sociétés de recrutement pour cette opportunité d'emploi. Indépendamment des pratiques antérieures, tous les CV soumis par des cabinets de recrutement à un membre de l'équipe BIC par e-mail, ou directement à un membre de l'équipe BIC sous quelque forme que ce soit, sans qu'un accord de recherche écrit valide ait été mis en place pour ce poste, seront considérés comme la propriété exclusive de BIC, et aucun honoraire ne sera versé dans le cas où le candidat serait embauché par BIC suite à la recommandation ou par d'autres moyens.

Declaration of Consent for Recruitment Application FormIn compliance with the regulations stipulated under the Turkish Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (hereinafter referred to as “KVKK”), I hereby affirm that Global Ports Holding Plc (“Company”) its subsidiaries and affiliates (hereinafter referred to as “Global Group”) has duly informed me on the conditions of processing of the personal data I shall disclose, details of such processing under KVKK, and I may rescind my consent on my discretion;I hereby acknowledge and consent to the terms outlined in the Privacy Notice concerning Collection, Processing, Transfer, Storage, and Secure Deletion of Personal Data, and as may be amended from time to time (hereinafter referred to as the “Privacy Notice”);I hereby authorize Global Group for the processing, storage, and transfer of my personal data (Name, Surname, Maiden Name, Identity Number, E-mail Address, Residence Address, Date and Place of Birth, previous employers, etc.) and sensitive personal data, as well as my résumé, interview notes and reference notes as delineated in the "Job Application Form”, for the specific purpose of recruitment processes, and subject to limitations defined under the Privacy Notice and statutory timeframes;I hereby authorize Global Group for storage of my personal data for the periods designated under the Privacy Notice or KVKK, in instances where the Company's legitimate interests are concerned, and extend my consent and authorization to group companies, subsidiaries, and affiliates with which the Company collaborates for legitimate interests concerning the recruitment process, as well as relevant third-party entities and collaborating institutions, as well as human resources personnel at Global Group, and as service providers in their capacity as to consultants Global Group, to access and communicate with me regarding my personal details and applications; andI hereby consent to the deletion of my personal information by Global Group after the lapse of period designated under the Privacy Notice or KVKK. I further affirm my explicit and unequivocal consent to undergo background checks, inclusive of criminal records, without any undue influence, free from any coercion and without any illegitimate contingency upon my recruitment; andGlobal Group member companies are subject to variety of personal data protection legislation under varying jurisdictions, and I recognize that my rights regarding collection, processing, storing, anonymisation and destruction may differ (you may inquire about details of your rights through dpo@globalportsholding.com)Should you concur with the Privacy Notice and Declaration of Consent, you may kindly proceed with your application for the advertised position.Job Description Head of Finance Global Ports Holding Tunisia - La Goulette Shipping CruiseCompany Overview: Global Ports Holding’s joint venture, La Goulette Shipping Cruise, is currently seeking a highly skilled and experienced Head of Finance to join our team in La Goulette, Tunisia. This role will report directly to the General Manager and will also have a dotted line to the Finance teams of the principal shareholders - Global Ports Holding and MSC Cruises.Primary Responsibilities:Financial Management: Monitor and analyze revenue, expenses, cash flows, and balance sheets, improve profitability and ensure legal compliance.Reporting: Prepare and examine financial records on a monthly and quarterly basis to ensure accuracy. Compliance: Manage and comply with all government reporting requirements and tax filings.Audit: Support group audit processes and manage the preparation of audit reviews (6 months/yearly).Budgeting: Manage the annual budget and projections, presenting company performance and forecasting to the board and senior management.Process Improvement: Participate in the execution of changes to procedures, policies, and systems to facilitate expansion, compliance, and scaling of the business.Record Keeping: Maintain an accurate filing and record-keeping system for all financial statements and company documents.Ad-hoc Projects: Manage and complete ad-hoc projects as needed.Travel: Limited regional and international travel might be required.Additional Responsibilities:Working with external auditors.Relationship management with cruise line operator finance leads.Contribute to the annual budget process and prepare projections with the General Manager and senior group management.Support essential business administration and financial processes for La Goulette Qualifications / Skills:Attention to Detail: Strong quantitative skills and organized personality.Decision Making: Adept at analyzing information and making strategic decisions.Confidentiality: Understanding of confidentiality and responsibility.Financial Modeling: Skills in financial modeling and awareness of business trends.Adaptability: Ability to manage multiple projects and adapt to changing environments.Experience: Experience with international finance and tax matters is a plus.Education and Experience Requirements:BA or BS in economics, finance, accounting, or a related field.Minimum 4-6 years of experience as a financial controller or accounting manager.CMA or CPA certification is desirable.Salary & Benefits: This position offers the successful candidate the opportunity to work with two leading international groups in the cruise sector, enjoy a competitive remuneration package, and participate in an environment where everyone has a voice and everyone participates in getting the job done.To Apply: Please send your resume and cover letter to tulink@globalportsholding.com.We look forward to receiving your application and potentially welcoming you to our dynamic team at La Goulette.

The Infor Decision Analytics and Science (IDEAS) team is responsible for setting the AI/ML strategy at Infor. Our industry-specific Augmented Intelligence (AI) solutions suite in Asset, Forecast, Customer, Pricing, People, and Operational Intelligence domains provides rapid and measurable value to enterprise customers. In pursuit of advancing our AI solutions, IDEAS is currently seeking a Scientist. This pivotal role requires both industry experience and technical expertise in building real-world ML models for enterprise applications. Your contributions will be instrumental in crafting highly automated, robust, reusable, explainable, user-friendly, and self-serviced algorithmic solutions that can be swiftly deployed and managed at scale.	A Day in The Life Typically Includes:	* Design, develop, and maintain analytical features in the Augmented Intelligence (AI) solutions using Infor OS platform.	* Build expertise and stay up to date with latest developments in Infor OS that can be leveraged by AI solutions.	* Design, optimize and implement data models and semantic business layers for AI solutions to reflect business objects, requirements, and constraints.	* Extract, process, cleanse, model, and conduct an in-depth evaluation of enterprise datasets to extract actionable insights that provide value to our customers.	* Perform functional tests with benchmark datasets.	* Maintain development artifacts and technical documentation in GitLab.	* Navigate ambiguous or incomplete business problems and guide the process of formulating them into clear functional and technical requirements for improving enterprise outcomes.	* Communicate complex technical concepts and insights to non-technical stakeholders through presentations, reports, and dashboards.	Basic Qualifications:	* Prior industry experience in developing and implementing data pipelines for AI solutions.	* Software development experience in Python, PySpark, and SQL and familiarity with scientific libraries commonly used in statistical analysis and machine learning.	* Familiarity with software development environments such as VSCode, and version control using Git and CI/CD pipelines.	* Knowledge of data models and relational databases. Proficiency in handling large datasets and data analysis with Tableau, Power BI, or similar BI tools.	* Familiarity with task management with JIRA.	Preferred Qualifications: 	* Masters in Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Operations Research, or a related quantitative discipline from an accredited university.	* Experience in system design, batch, and real-time architectures, explainable AI (XAI), AutoML, and MLOps.	* Familiarity with Infor and other ERPs across different industry segments.About InforInfor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation. For more information visit www.infor.comOur ValuesAt Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called [1] Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section at the bottom of the infor.com/about/careers webpage.At Infor we value your privacy that’s why we created a policy that you can read [2] here.ReferencesVisible links1. https://www.kochind.com/about/business-philosophy2. https://www.infor.com/about/privacy

Employment Type: Full-time & PermanentLocation: Dubai, UAE or Remote, from anywhere.Salary: Competitive, DOE + performance-based bonus - 0% tax environment + Equity participation.About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the European Gas and Power markets. Established in 2017, we are shaping the future of global commodity trading with a focus on deep analytics and technological innovation. Our success is driven by our people, whom we back with real responsibility from the start. At Cobblestone Energy, excellence is valued and extraordinary talent from around the world is welcomed. Our flat organisational structure encourages a culture of innovation, granting team members autonomy and ownership of their work.Cobblestone ValuesLifelong learning with continuous reflectionIndependent thinking through a meritocracy of ideasThe team is more important than the individual.Being the best in any market we enterHiring and keeping only the most effective peopleOthers must benefit from our existence.Role DescriptionWe are seeking an experienced Short-Term Gas Trader to join our dynamic team at Cobblestone. You will have the autonomy to oversee and execute trading strategies within the continental gas markets, leveraging your expertise to capitalize on market opportunities and mitigate risks.What we offer in this roleA full-time position on our Commercial teamCommitted and remarkably talented colleagues.Highly competitive compensation dependent on your experience and contributionsAn exciting, challenging, and fulfilling career.Opportunity to work on new projects from scratch and make independent decisions.Equity participation, ensuring aligned long-term interests.ResponsibilitiesDevelop and execute short-term trading strategies across all of Europe, with a focus on identifying profitable opportunities while managing risk exposure.Conduct in-depth analysis of market trends and developments to inform trading decisions and provide regular market commentary to senior management.Stay up to date with regulatory requirements and market developments in the gas trading industry and maintain a strong network of industry contacts.Collaborate with other traders, analysts, and risk management teams to develop and implement effective trading strategies.RequirementsA track record of success in gas trading, with at least one year of experience in trading across all of Europe.Experience in transport and storage optimization.Strong analytical skills and ability to think strategically, with a proven ability to make sound trading decisions in fast-paced environments.An entrepreneurial mindset with a focus on driving results and achieving business growth.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a proven ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders.Experience in Algorithmic/Automated Trading is desirable but not mandatory.Experience in short-term proprietary speculative trading is an advantage.

job_title: Marketing and Communications Coordinator [B2B IT Services]
job_description: What Is This Job AboutWe are seeking a talented Marketing and Communications Coordinator to join our team. As the Marketing and Communications Coordinator, you will be responsible for developing and implementing strategic communication initiatives to enhance the company's reputation, strengthen brand presence, and engage with key stakeholders. This role combines elements of public relations, and digital branding, requiring a versatile and skilled professional who can effectively manage multiple responsibilities.What You Will Get To Do:Participate in developing the marketing strategy and set-up marketing campaigns and activities Develop and execute comprehensive communication strategies to enhance the company's brand image and reputation.  Manage and oversee all public relations activities, including media relations and media outreach. Create compelling content for various communication channels, including press releases, newsletters, website, social media, and internal communications. Monitor and analyze media coverage and industry trends to identify opportunities and proactively address any potential issues. Develop and maintain relationships with media outlets and industry influencers. Manage the company's digital branding efforts, including social media platforms, website content, and online advertising campaigns. Coordinate and organize corporate events, conferences, and trade shows to promote the company's brand and products/services. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and brand alignment across all communication channels. Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in the field of corporate communications. RequirementsWhat You Should HaveBachelor's degree in Communications, Public Relations, Media Creation & Design, Marketing, or a related field. Very good English and French language skills Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to create compelling content for various platforms. Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build and maintain relationships with internal and external stakeholders. In-depth knowledge of digital marketing, social media platforms, and content management systems. Experience in managing corporate events and coordinating with vendors and suppliers. Proactive and detail-oriented with excellent organizational and project management skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, multitask, and meet deadlines. Familiarity with the Information Security sector is a plus. BenefitsWhat We Can Offer YouCulture - You'll have the opportunity to work with people from different countries in our English/German speaking offices in Europe  Learning - We have a learning and development focused environment with an emphasis on knowledge sharing, training, and regular internal technical talks. Compensation - You’ll receive an attractive salary, pension, restaurent tickets, and insurance plans

This role is integral to maintaining our high standards of operational efficiency.The Administrative Services Officer is part of a team, supporting our management and business teams by dealing with their requirements and ensuring that our clients and business priorities are achieved.Responsibilities:Provide day-to-day administrative support to various departments as required;Closely work with audit managers to ensure high-quality standards;Assist managers on planning and reports deliverables;Responsible for the layout, proofreading, and editing of audit reports, engagement letters, and various related correspondence, ensuring accuracy, clarity, and adherence to company standards;Ensure that all administrative activities are conducted in a timely and efficient manner.Your profile:Diploma related to areas of Business administration or a foreign language (French or English),  years of operational administrative experience;Fluent in French and English with excellent written and spoken skillsProficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and PDF softwareKnowledge of ERP software is a must (Workday)Flexibility in work hours may be required based on operational needsAble to deliver work of a consistent level of accuracy with attention to detailExcellent communication and organizational skillsWe offer: The ability to acquire and develop an experience that will ensure a career in an expanding environmentThe opportunity to join a human sized international group and friendly environment that can give relief to your skills and satisfy your intellectual curiosity.

Who are we?Amaris Consulting est une société indépendante de conseil et de technologies au service des entreprises. Avec plus de 1000 clients dans le monde, nous déployons des solutions pour les plus grands projets depuis plus d'une décennie - tout ceci est rendu possible par une équipe internationale de 7 600 talents répartis sur les 5 continents et dans plus de 60 pays. Nos solutions sont axées sur quatre domaines d'activité différents : Les systèmes d'information et le digital, la télécommunication, les sciences de la vie et l'ingénierie. Nous cherchons à créer et à développer une communauté de talents où tous les membres de notre équipe peuvent réaliser leur plein potentiel. Amaris est votre « stepping stone » pour traverser les rivières du changement, pour relever les défis et pour réaliser tous vos projets avec succès.Chez Amaris, nous avons à cœur d'offrir à nos candidats la meilleure expérience de recrutement possible. Nous cherchons à mieux connaître et comprendre nos candidats, à les challenger et à leur faire part de nos impressions le plus rapidement possible. Voici à quoi ressemble notre processus de recrutement :Premier contact : Notre processus commence généralement par une brève conversation virtuelle/téléphonique pour en savoir plus sur vous ! L'objectif ? Apprendre à vous connaître, comprendre vos motivations et veiller à ce que nous vous proposions le poste qui vous correspond le mieux !Entretiens (en moyenne, le nombre d'entretiens est de 3 – il peut toutefois varier en fonction du niveau d'ancienneté requis pour le poste). Au cours des entretiens, vous rencontrerez les membres de notre équipe : votre supérieur hiérarchique bien sûr, mais aussi d'autres personnes avec lesquelles vous serez amené à travailler. Ces entretiens nous permettront d'en apprendre davantage sur vous, votre expérience et vos compétences, mais aussi sur le poste et ce que l'on attendra de vous. Bien entendu, vous apprendrez également à connaître Amaris : notre culture, notre histoire, nos équipes et vos opportunités de carrière !Étude de cas: En fonction du poste, vous serez peut-être appelé à passer un test. Il pourra s'agir d'un jeu de rôle, d'une évaluation technique, d'un scénario de résolution de problème, etc.Comme vous le savez, chaque personne est différente et il en va de même pour chaque rôle dans une entreprise. C'est pourquoi nous devons nous adapter en conséquence, si bien que le processus peut parfois être quelque peu différent pour chacun. Cela dit, nous nous mettons toujours à la place du candidat pour lui offrir la meilleure expérience possible. Nous avons hâte de vous rencontrer !Job DescriptionAmaris consulting cherche à recruter un Assistant Administratif pour l'extension de ses équipes à Tunis.Responsabilités :Assurer la gestion administrative.Superviser et résoudre les requêtes des guichets dédiés (incidents, énergie, accès, premium, etc.).Utiliser SAP pour assurer le suivi rigoureux des opérations administratives.Collaborer avec les équipes techniques pour garantir une coordination efficace des ressources.Assurer le respect des normes de qualité et des délais dans l'exécution des tâches administratives.Compétences Requises :Diplômé(e) récent(e) de licence en gestion, administration ou domaine similaire, sans expérience préalable requise.Connaissances académiques en SAP et en gestion administrative (appréciée).Capacité à apprendre rapidement et à s'adapter à un environnement dynamique.Fortes compétences en communication et en résolution de problèmes.Capacité à travailler de manière autonome tout en faisant preuve de leadership.Aimant relever des défis au quotidien, vous savez travailler en autonomie et être force de proposition auprès de vos interlocuteurs afin d’apporter une valeur ajoutée à vos projets. Grâce à un management de proximité et une politique RH personnalisée, vous serez accompagné dans la construction de votre parcours au sein de l'entreprise. Vos qualités relationnelles seront des atouts importants pour réussir dans la fonction et évoluer au sein de notre groupe.Vous souhaitez intégrer une équipe dynamique et innovante ?Alors rejoignez-nous !

Le posteL’ingénieur qualité assure la gestion et l’amélioration de la qualité des produits et des procédés de fabrication. En tant qu’ingénieur qualité, votre mission principale sera de vous assurer du respect des processus sur l’ensemble du cycle de vie du produit et la résolution rapide et pérenne des problèmes. Vous serez également le point de contact privilégié vers l’extérieur (clients, fournisseurs) pour les sujets liés à la qualité (réclamations, audits, gestion de plans de progrès...).Le poste d’Ingénieur Qualité est rattaché hiérarchiquement au Responsable Qualité France/Tunisia et va être base à Monastir.Missions et ResponsabilitésSupporter les équipes projets lors de l’introduction de nouveaux produits (suivi jalons et délivrables associés, APQP, PPAP/MRR).Prendre des décisions en fonction des risques identifiés.S’assurer de la conformité des livrables dans les délais des jalons projets.Communiquer des plans d’amélioration auprès des clients.Piloter des plans d’amélioration avec les fournisseurs.Assurer l’interface entre les parties prenantes externes et Smiths Interconnect (clients, fournisseurs, Groupe Smiths).Préparer et animer les audits (clients, fournisseurs) en équipe pluridisciplinaire.Piloter le suivi des actions correctives à la suite des audits et visites (clients, fournisseurs) en respectant les délais.Gérer, suivre et vérifier l’efficacité des actions correctives mises en place.Mener des projets d’amélioration continue (LEAN, SIX SIGMA).S’approprier et appliquer les exigences du système de management du site.Prévenir et limiter les risques sécurité et environnement dans le cadre de sa mission.Diversité et InclusionNous croyons que la diversité des modes de pensée et des parcours de nos employés contribue au succès de l’entreprise. Toutes les candidatures correspondant au profil seront examinées de façon équitable, indépendamment de la race, de la couleur, la religion, le sexe, l’orientation et l’identité sexuelle, le pays d’origine, la situation économique, l’handicap, l’âge ou toute autre caractéristique du candidat protégée par la loi. Nous sommes fiers d’être une entreprise ouverte à tous, avec des valeurs basées sur l’égalité et l’éthique, où la diversité est encouragée, appréciée, et valorisée.Profil recherchéUn diplôme d’ingénieur ou une formation universitaire en qualitéL’expérience significative dans l’industrie (de préférence en mécanique, assemblage, matériaux métalliques et plastiques)Maitrise des outils informatiques (Pack Office).Connaissances en LEAN /6 SIGMA (certification appréciée), aussi qu’une maîtrise des méthodes de résolution de problèmes (8D)Connaissance des normes qualité ISO9001, EN9100, et ISO/TS 22163 (idéalement)Un très bon niveau d’anglais (écrit et parlé)Expérience du mode projet et outils associés (APQP/PPAP)Esprit d'analyse et de synthèse, rigueur, dynamisme, bon rédactionnel, autonomie, bonne pédagogie.Smiths en quelques motsAu sein du groupe Smiths, nous utilisons les technologies de pointe pour concevoir, fabriquer et fournir des solutions innovantes leader sur le marché qui répondent aux besoins de nos clients et touchent la vie de millions de personnes chaque jour. Nous sommes un FTSE100, une entreprise mondiale d'environ 14,600 salariés, basée dans 50+ pays. Nos solutions ont un impact réel sur la vie partout sur la planète, puisqu’elles créent un environnement propice à l'industrie, améliorent les soins de santé, renforcent la sécurité et en font progresser la connectivité. Nos produits et services sont souvent essentiels aux activités de nos clients, tandis que notre technologie exclusive et nos niveaux de service élevés contribuent à créer un avantage concurrentiel. Nous intégrons des collaborateurs reconnus pour leur curiosité d’esprit qui aiment prendre des responsabilités, aimant relever les défis et qui sont attirés par l'idée de travailler dans une entreprise de près de 170+ ans d’expérience dans l'innovation et cinq divisions mondiales, toutes expertes dans leur domaine.Smiths Interconnect en quelques motsSmiths Interconnect est un leader dans la fourniture de composants électroniques, de sous-systèmes, de produits utilisant la technologie micro-ondes et la fréquence radio, qui garantissent une connectivité rapide et sécurisée des applications critiques sur les marchés de la défense, de l'aérospatiale, des communications et de l'industrie. Notre technologie micro-ondes est utilisée dans les radars, systèmes de communication et de surveillance stratégiques qui fonctionnent dans des environnements extrêmes, dans l'aérospatiale et la défense. Nos composants à micro-ondes et nos connecteurs garantissent des performances, une durabilité et une sécurité optimales aux satellites spatiaux. Nos produits de test de semi-conducteurs sont utilisés pour tester des semi-conducteurs et des circuits électroniques hautement sophistiqués dans les systèmes de communication, les jeu vidéos et les appareils informatiques. Nos systèmes d'antennes en vol offrent aux passagers une connectivité Internet de porte à porte sur des avions du monde entier. Nos solutions de connecteurs et de câbles garantissent la fiabilité des équipements médicaux critiques et le fonctionnement en toute sécurité des trains et des systèmes de transport. L'une des cinq divisions du Smiths Group, Smiths Interconnect, emploie plus de 2 000 personnes. La vente de nos produits dans plus de 50 pays, avec des usines de fabrication dans 9 pays et des bureaux en Amérique du Nord, en Europe et en Asie nous assurent une présence mondiale.

Vidal Associates Consulting and Search, acteur de référence dans le recrutement par approche directe de cadres spécialistes et de dirigeants en France et à l'international, recrute pour son client un(e) Ingénieur informatique génie logiciel H/F, poste basé à Tunis (Tunisie).Notre client est un groupe bancaire international fondé en 1930, originaire du Moyen-Orient, qui occupe une position de premier plan dans de nombreux marchés et centres financiers à travers les cinq continents. Son objectif principal est de contribuer au développement économique et financier en offrant des services diversifiés et de haute qualité.Proposant une vaste gamme de produits et services financiers, ses domaines d'activité principaux englobent les services bancaires pour les particuliers, les professionnels et les entreprises.Dans le cadre de la croissance de ses activités en Tunisie, notre client recrute un(e) :Ingénieur informatique génie logiciel H/FPoste basé à Tunis (Tunisie)Vous Aurez Comme Missions DeConcevoir, développer et maintenir des applications bancaires critiques en respectant les normes de qualité et de sécurité ; Collaborer avec les équipes métier pour comprendre les exigences fonctionnelles et techniques ; Effectuer des tests approfondis pour garantir la fiabilité et la performance des applications ; Participer à des revues de code et fournir un feedback constructif à l'équipe ; Rester à jour sur les nouvelles technologies et les meilleures pratiques de développement logiciel.De formation ingénieur informatique .Vous disposez d'une expérience significative dans le secteur bancaire ou un éditeur de logiciels pour les banques.Vous avez une forte expertise dans les langages de programmation tels que Java,JavaScript, Typescript, Python, PHP,PL/SQL.Dot.Net, C#.Vous avez une bonne connaissance des frameworks et outils de développement tels que Angular 9, Nodejs, Django, Android Studio, Laravel,React JS.Vous avez une bonne connaissance de OS : Windows, Linux , environnement collaboratif : GitHub, Jira, Scrum,Mantis.Vous avez une bonne capacité de communication, à l'oral comme à l'écrit en Français , l'anglais est un atout.Empathie, ouverture d'esprit , capacité d'écoute ,esprit d'analyse et de synthèse , réactivité , aptitude à travailler en équipe , bonnes qualités relationnelles , bonne résistance au stress sont vos atouts pour réussir ce poste.Afin d'étudier votre candidature avec attention, nous vous remercions de l'adresser à VIDAL ASSOCIATES Consulting & Search, en déposant votre dossier sous la référence « Vt15138F » sur notre site www.talentup.com ou par email à vt15138f-145@talentup.net

Infinity is a contracting service provider for construction industry, we handle subcontractors payroll removing the risk of IR35 & employment law related issues.The RoleEnglish Speaking Telesales Representative with British or American Accent –ZAR15,000- ZAR19,000 + Uncapped Commission– South Africa/ Remotely.The Infinity Group is a contracting service provider for the construction industry based in London. We provide subcontractors’ payroll, removing the risk of IR35 and employment law-related issues.Our service provides the handling of invoicing, receiving payments from construction companies or agencies, processing of their payments, and deductions of CIS tax and Umbrella Service.We are looking for an experienced and self-driven Telesales Representative to join our Sales team, you will be responsible for generating calls to potential clients with the main goal of achieving your sales quota.We expect you to be an outstanding communicator and listener with a professional, but friendly approach. You will join us on a full-time, permanent basis working work from the comfort of your own home. We will provide you with the tools and equipment to enable you to do your job. and in return will receive a competitive salary of along with other fantastic benefits.Key ResponsibilitiesManaging databases - CRM system/sales pipeline / diary managementGenerating new business - Researching organisations to identify new leads and potential clients.Prospect and generate leads through various channels, including outbound cold calling and email campaigns.Engage potential clients in meaningful conversations to understand their payroll needs and challenges.Present our payroll solutions persuasively, highlighting their benefits and value proposition.Maintain accurate records of interactions and sales activities using CRM software.Meet or exceed weekly and monthly sales targets.Provide feedback to management regarding market trends and customer preferences.Managing accounts - Maintaining a relationship with existing clients.Pitching services and building a pipeline.Booking meetings.The BenefitsLucrative commission structure based on achieving and surpassing KPIs.Collaborative and supportive work environment conducive to professional success.Opportunities for advancement within the company based on merit and performance.Are you an experienced Telesales Representative with at least 3 year experience looking for an exciting new opportunity? Apply now and Join us at The Infinity Group to embark on a rewarding career journey.Job Type: Full-timePay: R15 000,00 - R19 000,00 per monthApplication Question(s)How many years of Telesales experience do you have?How many cold calls have you done in one day?Are you able to close deals over the phone?Are you able to present online?ExperienceTelesales / Cold calling: 3 years (Required)Ideal ProfileThe RequirementsFluently speaking British or American accent to effectively liaise with the stakeholders of the region.Proven experience in Telesales or a similar role, preferably in the B2B sector.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Strong negotiation and persuasion abilities.Ability to work effectively in a target-driven environment.Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools.High level of resilience and persistence in overcoming objections and rejections.What's on Offer?Attractive Salary & Benefits

job_description: Description de l'entrepriseSopra HR Software, filiale de Sopra Steria, offre des solutions RH complètes parfaitement adaptées aux besoins des Directions des Ressources Humaines et aux organisations de moyennes et grandes tailles, des secteurs public et privé.Spécialiste du pilotage des RH, de la paie et du talent management dans un contexte local et international, Sopra HR accompagne plus de 950 clients, en mode « on-premise » ou mode cloud.Partenaire de la réussite de la transformation digitale de ses clients vers la RH 3.0, Sopra HR, acteur global des Ressources Humaines, privilégie la Co-innovation, favorise les enjeux de performance RH et met en avant l’expérience collaborateur.Description du postePérimètreLe Service Delivery Manager est rattaché à la Direction des opérations de Production Cloud de SHRS.Il travaille en étroite collaboration avec les équipes de Delivery et de production pour répondre aux exigences de déploiement de nos environnements. Il travaille aussi avec nos partenaires d’infrastructure et avec nos clients.MissionsÊtre le point d’entrée unique des projets métiersPilotage au quotidien de l’activité afin de livrer un service conforme aux engagements contractuelsGestion des réunions projets en interne et avec nos clientsAmélioration de la qualité et l’intégralité des référentiels projetsProposition des scénarios d’évolution et de simplification des procédures existantes et en mettre en place de nouvellesAssurance du déploiement des projets : la qualité de service aux clients, le respect du calendrier, la disponibilité des ressources projetsQualificationsDiplômé(e) d’une école d’ingénieur ou d’un parcours universitaire technique, vous justifiez d’au moins 8 ans d’expérience professionnelle en tant que Service Delivery Manager avec profil technique :Capacité à travailler de manière autonome et à gérer plusieurs tâches simultanémentUne expérience dans la gestion de projet, d’équipe et de contrat, et idéalement, une première expérience sur un poste similaireDe la rigueur, un bon sens du service et la volonté de délivrer un service de qualité pour accompagner l’activité du clientCapacite de synthèse, de présentation des travaux effectués et de rédaction de documentations/capitalisations.Très bonne communication à l’orale et à l’écrit en langue française et anglaiseInformations complémentairesCompétences appréciéesCompétences et appétence pour la technique et la gestion des projetsConnaissances : maîtrise des outils de présentationVos principales qualités Autonomie, Responsabilité, organisé, rigoureux, Très bonne qualité relationnelle et rédactionnelle.

Capable to create/introduce automation (semi and full) concepts to existing production lines and for new products. As a Business Analysis Graduate at HP you will be an active member of the Middle East and Africa Commercial Organization team being responsible for building business analyses and models to help us develop business plans and strategic decisions. You will also perform market research projects and gather intelligence on current industry, technology and consumer trends, as well as support your team through planning and project initiatives.Within the program you will be able to create your own development plan and enhance your soft skills through sales and leadership trainings, on-the-job stretch assignments, feedback sessions, and coachingwith world class IT leaders.As a graduate at HP, you can expect to connect with brilliant people who help you perform at your best and work with a team that’s as passionate about solving challenges as it is about developing solutions.Among Your Talents, Do You HaveBachelor degree or equivalent obtained in the last 12 months/longer in International Business/Commerce/Computer Science with a major in Business Analytics, Data Analysis/Management, Information Systems, or International Finance.Strong analytical skills, conceptual thinking and ability to summarize and present complex information into simple modelsGood business understanding and financial acumenExcellent planning, organizational and time management skills.Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, Powerpoint and OutlookPassion about technology and innovationSelf-motivation and willingness to learnCreativity, proactiveness and strong interpersonal skillsExcellent communication, negotiation and presentation skillsExperience with PowerBI and/or Tableau Software is a plusFluency in English and Arabic languageDo you want to make an impact?Begin your journey by reinventing the best practices other companies already look up to.
